AdminMessage: <color=#838383>[</color><color=#f7432a>BestRust Servers</color><color=#838383>]</color> If you need help or would like to report a player, please create a ticket on our discord. We are always happy to help you! <color=#ff5c45>discord.gg/bestrustservers</color>
